comments: It appears that the (unsigned) sequence is identical to its 5th order absolute difference. - _John W. Layman_, Sep 23 2003
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: H. W. Gould, Binomial coefficients, the bracket function and compositions with relatively prime summands, Fib. Quart. 2(4) (1964), 241-260.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
